EmailTemplate.name: Jackie's TIBS Appt Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Toronto International Boat Show Invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.FirstName}
Exciting News!!! The Toronto International Boat Show is coming soon!! The boat show starts January 20 and goes to January 29.
Legend Boats will be showcasing our new 2017 line up! It's going to be amazing! We take a lot of pride in our new line up and as a valued customer we want you to see it first hand. If you would like to attend the Boat Show please let me know. I would love the opportunity to show you our new line up and assist you in choosing the right boat that best suits your needs.
Let me help you make this upcoming summer a legendary one!!
Yours in boating,
Jackie Carrigan Legend Boats Barrie jcarrigan@legendboats.com 705 417 6856
